xten.name: qrcode
xten.initElement:
<%
        const placeholder = element.querySelector('[name="qrcode-image"]');
        var typeNumber = 4;
        var errorCorrectionLevel = 'L';
        var qr = qrcode(typeNumber, errorCorrectionLevel);
        qr.addData(element.getAttribute('data') || '');
        qr.make();
        placeholder.innerHTML = qr.createImgTag();
    %>

icon.name: qrcode-add
icon.click:
<%
                const element = event.target.closest('.wx-xten-qrcode');
                const value = await wxfns.getValue('qrcode', 'text', 'QR Code', {qrcode: element.getAttribute('data')});

                await wxfns.transaction(element, 'save-page-data', value.trim());
                element.setAttribute('data', value);

                const placeholder = element.querySelector('[name="qrcode-image"]');
                var typeNumber = 4;
                var errorCorrectionLevel = 'L';
                var qr = qrcode(typeNumber, errorCorrectionLevel);
                qr.addData(value || '');
                qr.make();
                placeholder.innerHTML = qr.createImgTag();
            %>
